dcterms:creator: Ferhan Türe
Oliver Jojic
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 108,442 questions annotated by hand in English, used for first-order factoid question answering, derived from a subset of knowledge from the FreeBase dataset.
dcterms:title: SimpleQuestions

dcterms:description: A large knowledge base containing 17.8 million facts, on 4 million unique entities, consisting of 7523 relation types, used as a source of knowledge for the SimpleQuestions dataset.
dcterms:title: FreeBase

dcterms:creator: Radim Řehůřek
Petr Sojka
dcterms:description: A pre-trained word embedding model used to transform question words into 300-dimensional vectors for the purpose of entity detection and relation prediction.
dcterms:title: Google News Word2Vec

dcterms:creator: Michael Collins
dcterms:description: A natural language processing library used for tagging noun clusters in questions to improve entity detection accuracy.
dcterms:title: SpaCy
